transcript.text:
￼














Template & Studio


Settings
Studio Language Text References

3 min
overview & purpose the feature enables you to personalize the studio text for the end customer by personalizing the messages and references for ease of navigation and use through this feature, you can define the labels, tool tip text, pop up messages, etc for the front end user configuration personalize text references similar to the language text references docid\ ifoabsrca 8kme7rapape in the store personalization menu, you can define the language text reference for the studio pages as well also, you have the provision to define the studio text references product wise import text references admin can also bulk import ‘language text reference’ for the designer studio this will help you quickly upload language text references for multiple studio languages to import the studio text references, navigate to the designer studio >> studio settings >> language text reference and click on the import studio language text references button from the top right corner of the screen select the language from the dropdown it will list all the languages enabled by the admin using the 3 step feature as shown in the above screen, you can easily download, fill and upload the excel file
Did this page help you?
